labels.value: TC_55!048 | Applied filters 'Region/Sectors' are not displayed after selecting an item from the 'Most traded' dropdown in the 'Live shares prices'  widget on the 'Shares' page

items.statusDetails:
Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Germany', 'Japan', 'Sweden', 'Energy', 'Industrials'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: []

Failed: Bug # 55!048 Expected result: Applied filters 'Region/Sectors': ['Japan', 'Norway', 'United Arab Emirates', 'Industrials', 'Technology'] 
are not displayed after selecting item 'Most traded' from the dropdown, 
only filters are displayed: ['Norway']
